name: Miner Proof Of Concept
description:
Destroy the blocks around you to reach your goal before the time runs out. Punch, jump and pound to carve your path to the goal.

Best played with a controller but keyboard controls are available.

A proof of concept I need some feedback on before taking too much further.

A WIP but let me know what you think - @lizziefashizie

N.B. Procedural generation will result in some bugs. Apologies in advance. Also enemies won't hurt you in this demo, you can hurt them however.
